content: I completely understand your frustration at the issues surrounding some events, and it's true that with the amount of resources and expertise available, one would expect a higher level of organization and preparedness. The athletes put in years of hard work and sacrifice to compete at this level, and they deserve the best possible environment to showcase their skills. Similarly, spectators invest their time, money, and energy into attending events, and they should be able to enjoy a high-quality and safe experience. By prioritizing the athletes and spectators and taking a thorough and thoughtful approach to planning, organizers can help ensure that events run as smoothly and successfully as possible, and that controversies are minimized.
